DOC.brief_title: Morphine Versus Ketorolac Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The study take place Emergency Department Clinical Emergency Hospital Bucharest compare analgesic effect ketorolac tromethamine morphine low back pain . The patient randomise receive either ketorolac 30 mg intravenous ( diluted 20 ml 0,9 % saline ) morphine 0,1 mg/kg weight intravenous . A scale 1-10 use measuring pain , effect treatment evaluate 15 minute 30 minute administration drug . After 30 minute significant reduction pain rescue therapy use : acetaminophen 1 g , sodic metamizole 1g dilute 500 ml saline medication use study ( morphine ketorolac tromethamine ) .
